Text: Why did you think Trump called Putin first? Senators and Governers need to act now. He is also threatening to invade States with fed troops and dog-whistling armed right-wing militias to "practice their 2nd Amendment".  #ICantBreathe #GeorgeFloyd #BlackLivesMatter #Dictatorship

We need the BAME report on COVID-19 now. We need to ensure ALL MPs can vote safely today. We need Boris Johnson to condemn Donald Trump in the strongest possible terms regardless of where this leaves a trade agreement. These 3 things are all absolutely crucial today

Omg!! Trump was in a bunker for less than an hour! Such a coward!! Omg!! Trump is out in public amongst the protesters. He also held a bible!Oh the outrage!! 🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄You freaking liberals are a piece of work. Shaddduup!!
Biden is not mincing words today. Trump's comments were not the words of a president. The were the words of segregationists and vicious racists like Bull Connor.

Powerful words from @realDonaldTrump tonight making it clear all Americans are going to be protected.This is what we elected President Trump to do - to lead with bold, dramatic action. These lawless riots ; acts of violence will not continue indefinitely. They will end now.

I see there are many people, most in media, more upset about President Trump walking to St. John's Church and holding up a bible than they were about the church being lit on fire by rioters last night.

Please don't just post a black square. Write to your MP now with these demands: - Immediate suspension of UK sales of teargas, riot shields + rubber bullets to the US - Condemn Trump's use of force against his own citizens- Release the delayed report into BAME Covid deaths
Joe Biden: I call on Congress to act "this month" to start on police reforms. It is time to pass legislation that makes  "equal protection under the law" real.

President Trump just shoved the BIBLE in the Devil's face yesterday.So for those of you who haven't found Christ or are lukewarm in your faith....It's time to recognize this is a spiritual war between good vs evil.And God wins. 🙏🏻
